siteMetadata.title: Rapydly | Dynamic Back Office
siteMetadata.description: A highly customisable, scalable, and responsive web app for managing and visualising all of your databases & apps. Rapydly's Dymanic Back Office builds itself from your database structure on the fly, meaning you'll never have to maintain a separate back office when other applications or databases evolve.
siteMetadata.author: Rapydly Ltd.
